title: OpenAI to Show Ads in ChatGPT for Logged-In U.S. Adults on Free and Go Plans
description: OpenAI on Friday said it would start showing ads in ChatGPT to logged-in adult U.S. users in both the free and ChatGPT Go tiers in the coming weeks, as the artificial intelligence (AI) company expanded access to its low-cost subscription globally.
